auth.confirmPasswordText: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
auth.resetPasswordText: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
auth.name: Name
auth.signInToAccount: Sign in to your TaskPilot account
auth.createAccountToStart: Create your account to get started

chat.assistantDescription: Ask for summaries or actions. First reply visible preview.
chat.subscribeMessage: To continue and view AI insights, you'll need to subscribe.
chat.subscribeToSeeAnswer: To see this AI answer and keep chatting, subscribe to a paid plan.
chat.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
chat.failedResponse: Failed to get response from assistant
chat.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm your project assistant. Ask me anything about "{{projectName}}".
chat.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.documentationDescription: Laravel has wonderful documentation covering every aspect of the framework. Whether you are a newcomer or have prior experience with Laravel, we recommend reading our documentation from beginning to end.
welcome.laracastsDescription: Laracasts offers thousands of video tutorials on Laravel, PHP, and JavaScript development. Check them out, see for yourself, and massively level up your development skills in the process.
welcome.laravelNewsDescription: Laravel News is a community driven portal and newsletter aggregating all of the latest and most important news in the Laravel ecosystem, including new package releases and tutorials.
welcome.vibrantEcosystemDescription: Laravel's robust library of first-party tools and libraries, such as Forge, Vapor, Nova, Envoyer, and Herd help you take your projects to the next level. Pair them with powerful open source libraries like Cashier, Dusk, Echo, Horizon, Sanctum, Telescope, and more.

landing.heroDescription: A single place for projects, tasks, chat, docs, and more. Streamline your workflow and boost team collaboration.

collaborate.title: Work together
collaborate.description: Collaborate on projects in real time, share files, and communicate with your team all in one place.

customize.title: Customize in a click
customize.description: Configuring TaskPilot for different types of work is as easy as flipping a switch.

integrate.title: Plays well with others
integrate.description: Connect TaskPilot to your favorite tools and streamline your workflow.

search.title: Search everything
search.description: Find any file in TaskPilot, a connected app, or your local drive, from one place.

aiProductivity.title: AI-powered productivity
aiProductivity.description: Get work done faster with the only AI-powered assistant tailored to your role.

streamline.title: Streamline workflows
streamline.description: Eliminate repetitive tasks and focus on what matters most.

stayAhead.title: Stay ahead of what's next
stayAhead.description: Organize your work, reminders, and calendar events all from your personalized Home.

head.landing: TaskPilot - The AI workspace where all your work gets done
head.appsumoSuccess: Welcome to TaskPilot - Lifetime Access Activated!

appsumo.redeemSubheading: Get lifetime access to TaskPilot with your AppSumo purchase

appsumo.whatsIncluded: What's Included in Your Lifetime Access
appsumo.lifetimeDescription: All premium features, forever. No recurring payments.
appsumo.certificationDescription: Get certified as a Project Management Professional

appsumo.takeCertificationDescription: Get certified and enhance your career
appsumo.questionsContact: Questions? Reach out to us at

contactUs.detailsPlaceholder: Please describe your issue or question in detail... (minimum 10 characters)

certification.detailedResponsePlaceholder: Provide a detailed response explaining your approach, reasoning, and specific actions you would take as the project manager. Consider the impact on scope, time, cost, quality, and team dynamics.

simulator.explainScopeChangePlaceholder: Explain the reason for scope change...
simulator.explainBudgetNeedPlaceholder: Explain why additional budget is needed...

features.aiAssistantDesc: Upgrade to interact with our intelligent project assistant
features.automationDesc: Automate your workflow with smart triggers and actions
features.teamCollaborationDesc: Invite team members and collaborate on projects
features.reportsDesc: Generate detailed project reports and analytics
features.premiumFeatureDesc: This feature is available on paid plans

usage.limitReached: Limit reached - Upgrade for more access

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and provide personalized content. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies. You can manage your preferences in your browser settings.

paywall.aiTaskGenerationDesc: Generate intelligent, contextual tasks with AI assistance
paywall.automationDescription: Automate workflows and streamline your processes
paywall.teamCollaborationDescription: Invite team members and collaborate on projects
paywall.advancedReportsDesc: Generate detailed project reports and insights
paywall.aiAssistantDescription: Get intelligent help and suggestions for your projects

customViews.title: Custom Views
customViews.regenerateComponent: Please regenerate your component. The renderer only accepts valid TSX/JSX with export default.
customViews.useAssistant: Use the assistant to create a custom application.
customViews.welcomeDescription: Welcome to your custom application studio. Use AI to generate powerful, data-driven micro-applications tailored to your project needs.
customViews.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this saved application? This action cannot be undone. All saved data will be permanently removed from the database.
customViews.clearConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to clear this working area? The current component will be removed but no saved data will be affected.
customViews.componentReset: Component reset. You can now generate a new micro-application.
customViews.failedToSave: Failed to save. Please try again.

customViews.generatePrompt: Describe the component you want to generate...

projects.manageOrganizeSubtitle: Manage and organize your work with TaskPilot projects
projects.createFirstProject: Create your first project to get started with TaskPilot
projects.createNewProjectSubtitle: Step through basics, scope, and goals so AI can generate hyper-relevant suggestions later.
projects.howToCreateQuestion: How would you like to create your project?
projects.methodDescription: Choose to upload a project requirements document for AI analysis, or create your project manually step by step.
projects.uploadRequirementsDescription: Upload a document and let AI extract project details, timeline, objectives, and constraints automatically.
projects.quotaReachedBody: You've used {{used}} of {{limit}} this period. Upgrade your plan to extract more documents.
projects.quotaExceededError: Document extraction quota exceeded. Upgrade your plan to extract more documents.
projects.browseOrDrop: Click to browse or drag & drop your document
projects.supports: Supports: TXT, PDF, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MD, CSV, XLS, XLSX • Max 8MB
projects.upgradeToExtract: Upgrade your plan to extract more documents
projects.analyzing: Analyzing your document with AI... This may take a few moments.
projects.aiWarningMissingCore: AI could not reliably extract the project name or description. You can retry with a clearer document or proceed with manual creation.
projects.allowedTypesError: Allowed types: TXT, PDF, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MD, CSV, XLS, XLSX (max 8MB).
projects.fileTooLargeError: File size must be less than 8MB.
projects.failedToUploadAnalyze: Failed to upload and analyze document. Please try again.
projects.createManuallyDescription: Fill out the project details step by step using our guided form with basics, scope, and objectives.

basics.title: Project Basics
basics.subtitle: Start with the fundamental details of your project.
basics.nameHelper: The name should be clear and memorable
basics.keyHelper: A unique identifier (uppercase letters & numbers only)
basics.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the project's purpose, goals, and scope...
basics.descriptionHelper: Provide context and objectives for team members

objectives.subtitle: Define what success looks like and any limitations to consider.

objectives.primaryObjectivesHelper: List the key outcomes and measurable goals
objectives.constraintsPlaceholder: Any limitations, dependencies, or potential risks to be aware of?
objectives.constraintsHelper: Technical, budget, timeline, or resource constraints

review.title: Review & Submit

review.aiCompleteBody: Project details were extracted from your uploaded document. You can edit any field above if needed.
review.editLaterInfo: You can edit these details later in the project settings.
